language.name: Java
language.description: Java is a computer programming language that is concurrent, class-based, object-oriented, and specifically designed to have as few implementation dependencies as possible.

language.name: C#
language.description: C# is a multi-paradigm programming language encompassing strong typing, imperative, declarative, functional, generic, object-oriented (class-based), and component-oriented programming disciplines.

language.name: JavaScript
language.description: JavaScript is a dynamic computer programming language

language.name: Python
language.description: Python is a widely used general-purpose, high-level programming language.

language.name: Ruby
language.description: Ruby is a dynamic, reflective, object-oriented, general-purpose programming language.

language.name: Haskell
language.description: Haskell is a standardized, general-purpose purely functional programming language, with non-strict semantics and strong static typing.

language.name: Haskell
language.description: Scala is an object-functional programming and scripting language for general software applications.
